overview: Dr. Jeong's research is focused on using advanced MRI techniques to evaluate tumor extent and guide radiation therapy.
research_interests:
Dr. Jeong’s research interests include oncologic cardiac imaging and applying quantitative imaging techniques in renal cell carcinoma, neuroendocrine tumors, and pancreatic adenocarcinoma.
  *
